original_text: God does all these things for people. He does them many times. God does all these things for people. He does them many times. God does all these things for people. He does them many times. God does all these things for people. He does them many times. God does all these things for people.
korean_text: 실로 하나님이 사람에게 이 모든 일을 재삼 행하심은
